steps.sql: SELECT userId, movies.movieId, rating, timestamp, title, genres from ratings join movies on ratings.movieId = movies.movieId
SELECT movieId,cast(rating as float) as rating,timestamp,title,genres from moviesWithRatings where genres like '%Fantasy%'
SELECT movieId,title,avg(rating) as averageRating from fantasyMoviesWithRatings group by movieId,title order by averageRating desc limit 100
SELECT * from top100FantasyMovies where title like '%${myFavoriteMovie}%'
